overview.zh: Bi23团队专注于跨链资产服务，提供给用户安全、便捷的质押奖励服务和去中心化金融服务。目前Bi23不仅是Vite的超级节点，也是ViteX的运营商，积极深入的活跃在Vite生态建设中，Bi23亦是Cosmos、IRISnet、Tezos、Kava及Terra等项目的验证节点。
overview.en: Bi23 team focus on the Crypto-Assets, providing customers with Staking and DeFi services. Bi23 is not only the Third supernode of Vite, but also the operator of ViteX; Bi23 also are the validators of Cosmos\IRISnet\Tezos\Kava and Terra.
